page.title: 05SKIPPING RHYMES
page.content: These are skipping rhymes used by children in our school playground {Lady on the mountain "On the mountain stands a lady, Who she is I do not know, All she wants is gold and silver, All she wants is a fine young man." The two girls holding the rope then use the skippers name and the boy she likes saying "Alright (name) we will tell your mother, Kissing(boys name)round the corner, Is it true?" They then turn the rope very fast chanting "Yes no yes no......" If the skipper lands on yes it is true but if she lands on no it is untrue.
